question:
Consider the following statements in context with the Crimean–Congo hemorrhagic fever (CCHF)
  1. Crimean–Congo hemorrhagic fever (CCHF) is spread by an insect
  2. Crimean–Congo hemorrhagic fever (CCHF) does not produce disease in animals
Which among the above statements is / are correct?
explanation: Crimean–Congo hemorrhagic fever (CCHF) is spread by an insect. Crimean–Congo hemorrhagic fever (CCHF) does not produce disease in animals.
